comments.author: philipma1957
comments.created_time: December 23, 2022, 06:28:25 PMLast edit: December 23, 2022, 09:26:47 PM by philipma1957
comments.body: As a suggestion you should have the moderation option just in case a troll decides to attack the thread.you need to lock this one. then open a new one do not post the thread.click addition options first thingthis page with some choices will openclick ¬†self moderated

comments.author: kano
comments.body: I'd probably add that someone who sells miners is probably not ideal to run this thread Since it's not even 2023 yet, one of the two who have done it in the past should do it gain and just ignore this thread.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.created_time: December 24, 2022, 12:56:48 AMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 01:49:00 AM by mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: kano on December 24, 2022, 12:36:03 AMSince it's not even 2023 yet, one of the two who have done it in the past should do it gain and just ignore this thread.I agree that the OP shouldn't start this topic, not because of the reasons you mentioned, but because this topic has always been philipma1957's idea, it's just annoying to see someone using someone else's ideas and efforts over the years even if the intentions are good, anyone who wants to start a difficulty thread should at least ask for philipma's approval.Personally, if philipma1957 started one I would only participate in that topic even if I see 20 other topics related but if phill is fine with this topic, and doesn't want to start his own, we can just stick around and see how it goes.

comments.author: altair_tech
comments.body: Got it guys, my apologies!I'll lock this one and hopefully, philipma1957 or someone else can start a new one.
